22 class moveit_driver(object):
23 
24 
26  def __init__(self):
27  super(moveit_driver, self).__init__()
28 
29  moveit_commander.roscpp_initialize(sys.argv)
30  rospy.init_node('moveit_driver', anonymous=True)
31 
32  self.robot = moveit_commander.RobotCommander()
33  self.scene = moveit_commander.PlanningSceneInterface(synchronous=True)
34 
35  group_names = self.robot.get_group_names()
36  self.move_group = {}
37  for name in group_names:
38  self.move_group[name] = moveit_commander.MoveGroupCommander(name)
39 
40  self.move_group[name].set_planner_id('manipulator[BiTRRT]')
41  self.move_group[name].set_max_velocity_scaling_factor(1.0)
42  self.move_group[name].set_max_acceleration_scaling_factor(1.0)
43 
44  #print(self.robot.get_robot_markers(name))
45 
46 
48  def status(self):
49  group = self.move_group.keys()
50  for i, g in enumerate(group):
51  s = ["{:5.3f}".format(j*180.0/pi) for j in self.getJoint(g)]
52  s = "[" + ", ".join(s) + "]"
53  rospy.loginfo("group-{0} : {1} {2}".format(i, g, s))
54 
55 
61  def getJoint(self, name):
62  if name in self.move_group:
63  joint = self.move_group[name].get_current_joint_values()
64  return joint
65  else:
66  rospy.logerr("[getJoint] {0} is not group name.".format(name))
67  return None
68 
69 
74  def plan_and_move(self, name, goal):
75  ret = self.plan(name, goal)
76  if ret == None:
77  rospy.logerr("[plan_and_move] planning failed")
78  return False
79  else:
80  return self.move_group[name].execute(ret)
81 
82 
89  def plan(self, name, goal, start=None):
90 
91  if name in self.move_group:
92  robot_state = self.move_group[name].get_current_state()
93  joint_size = len(robot_state.joint_state.position)
94 
95  if not type(goal) is geometry_msgs.msg.Pose:
96  if joint_size != len(goal):
97  rospy.logerr("[plan] goal size must be {0}".format(joint_size))
98  return None
99 
100  if (start != None) and (joint_size != len(start)):
101  rospy.logerr("[plan] start size must be {0}".format(joint_size))
102  return None
103 
104  if start == None:
105  self.move_group[name].set_start_state_to_current_state()
106  else:
107  robot_state.joint_state.position = start
108  self.move_group[name].set_start_state(robot_state)
109 
110  if type(goal) is geometry_msgs.msg.Pose:
111  goal_state = goal
112  else:
113  goal_state = robot_state.joint_state
114  goal_state.position = goal
115 
116  """
117  oconst = OrientationConstraint()
118  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(pi,0,0)
119  oconst.orientation.x = q[0]
120  oconst.orientation.y = q[1]
121  oconst.orientation.z = q[2]
122  oconst.orientation.w = q[3]
123  oconst.link_name = self.move_group[name].get_end_effector_link()
124  const = Constraints()
125  const.orientation_constraints.append(oconst)
126  tconst = TrajectoryConstraints()
127  tconst.constraints.append(const)
128  self.move_group[name].set_trajectory_constraints(tconst)
129  """
130 
131  success, trajectory, planning_time, error_code = self.move_group[name].plan(goal_state)
132 
133  if success:
134  rospy.loginfo("[plan] success. planning_time={0}[sec]".format(planning_time))
135  trajectory = self.move_group[name].retime_trajectory(self.move_group[name].get_current_state(), trajectory)
136  return trajectory
137  else:
138  rospy.logerr("[plan] planning failed. {0}".format(error_code))
139  return None
140 
141  else:
142  rospy.logerr("[plan] {0} is not group name.".format(name))
143  return None
144 
145 
148  def set_workspace(self, ws, obj_name=""):
149  self.add_object("BOX", "{0}-Z".format(obj_name), [(ws[3]+ws[0])/2, (ws[4]+ws[1])/2, ws[2], 0,0,0], (ws[3]-ws[0],ws[4]-ws[1],0.001))
150  self.add_object("BOX", "{0}+Z".format(obj_name), [(ws[3]+ws[0])/2, (ws[4]+ws[1])/2, ws[5], 0,0,0], (ws[3]-ws[0],ws[4]-ws[1],0.001))
151  self.add_object("BOX", "{0}-X".format(obj_name), [ws[0], (ws[4]+ws[1])/2, (ws[5]+ws[2])/2, 0,0,0], (0.001, ws[4]-ws[1],ws[5]-ws[2]))
152  self.add_object("BOX", "{0}+X".format(obj_name), [ws[3], (ws[4]+ws[1])/2, (ws[5]+ws[2])/2, 0,0,0], (0.001, ws[4]-ws[1],ws[5]-ws[2]))
153  self.add_object("BOX", "{0}-Y".format(obj_name), [(ws[3]+ws[0])/2, ws[1], (ws[5]+ws[2])/2, 0,0,0], (ws[3]-ws[0],0.001,ws[5]-ws[2]))
154  self.add_object("BOX", "{0}+Y".format(obj_name), [(ws[3]+ws[0])/2, ws[4], (ws[5]+ws[2])/2, 0,0,0], (ws[3]-ws[0],0.001,ws[5]-ws[2]))

156 
166  def add_object(self, obj_type, name, pose, arg1=None, arg2=None, timeout=4):
167 
168  frame = self.robot.get_planning_frame()
169  if type(pose) is geometry_msgs.msg.PoseStamped:
170  pose_ = pose
171  pose_.header.frame_id = frame
172  elif type(pose) is geometry_msgs.msg.Pose:
173  pose_ = geometry_msgs.msg.PoseStamped()
174  pose_.pose = pose
175  pose_.header.frame_id = frame
176  elif type(pose) is list:
177  pose_ = list_to_pose_stamped(pose, frame)
178  else:
179  rospy.logerr("[add_object] Wrong pose type")
180  return False
181 
182  try:
183  if obj_type == "SPHERE":
184  self.scene.add_sphere(name, pose_, radius=arg1)
185  elif obj_type == "CYLINDER":
186  self.scene.add_cylinder(name, pose_, height=arg1, radius=arg2)
187  elif obj_type == "MESH":
188  self.scene.add_mesh(name, pose_, filename=arg1, size=arg2)
189  elif obj_type == "BOX":
190  self.scene.add_box(name, pose_, size=arg1)
191  elif obj_type == "PLANE":
192  self.scene.add_plane(name, pose_, normal=arg1, offset=arg2)
193  else:
194  rospy.logerr("[add_object] Wrong object type name")
195  return False
196 
197  except Exception as e:
198  rospy.logerr("[add_object] exception of %s", e)
199  return False
200 
201  return self.wait_for_state_update(name, is_known=True, timeout=timeout)
202 
203 
209  def rem_object(self, name=None, timeout=4):
210  if name is None:
211  for obj in self.scene.get_known_object_names():
212  self.scene.remove_world_object(obj)
213  if not self.wait_for_state_update(obj, timeout=timeout):
214  return False
215  return True
216  if name in self.scene.get_known_object_names():
217  self.scene.remove_world_object(name)
218  return self.wait_for_state_update(name, timeout=timeout)
219  rospy.logwarn("[rem_object] {0} is unregistered.")
220  return True
221 
222 
230  def attach_object(self, object_name, group_name, link_name=None, timeout=4):
231 
232  if not group_name in self.move_group:
233  rospy.logerr("{0} is not group name.".format(group_name))
234  return False
235  if not object_name in self.scene.get_known_object_names():
236  rospy.logerr("{0} is not object name.".format(object_name))
237  return False
238 
239  if link_name == None:
240  link_name = self.move_group[group_name].get_end_effector_link()
241  self.move_group[group_name].attach_object(object_name, link_name, touch_links=[])
242 
243  return self.wait_for_state_update(object_name, is_attached=True, timeout=timeout)
244 
245 
253  def detach_object(self, object_name, group_name, timeout=4):
254 
255  if not group_name in self.move_group:
256  rospy.logerr("{0} is not group name.".format(group_name))
257  return False
258 
259  attached_objects = self.scene.get_attached_objects([object_name])
260  if len(attached_objects.keys()) == 0:
261  rospy.logerr("{0} is not attached.".format(object_name))
262  return False
263 
264  self.move_group[group_name].detach_object(object_name)
265 
266  return self.wait_for_state_update(object_name, is_known=True, timeout=timeout)
267 
268 
276  def wait_for_state_update(self, name, is_known=False, is_attached=False, timeout=4):
277 
278  start = rospy.get_time()
279  seconds = rospy.get_time()
280  while (seconds - start < timeout) and not rospy.is_shutdown():
281  attached_objects = self.scene.get_attached_objects([name])
282  is_attached_ = len(attached_objects.keys()) > 0
283  is_known_ = name in self.scene.get_known_object_names()
284 
285  if (is_attached == is_attached_) and (is_known == is_known_):
286  return True
287 
288  rospy.sleep(0.1)
289  seconds = rospy.get_time()
290 
291  return False
